title.rendered: TTE gets ESCO Accreditation from RAK

content.rendered:
TTE hosted Andrea Di Gregorio, Executive Director – Energy Efficiency & Renewables Office, REEM and Dr. Pablo Izquierdo Lopez, Manager – Energy Services from the Ras Al Khaimah Municipality Department at its corporate office. The dignitaries had come to present the ESCO accreditation certificate to TTE and were received by Dilip Sharma, Executive Vice President, Rahul Kalra, Vice President – Projects Division and Praveen Unnikrishnan, Business Development Manager – ESCO Projects.

With ESCO accreditations from Dubai and RAK, TTE is one of the recognized energy services and retrofit companies in the UAE, implementing a full range of energy efficiency solutions for projects across all industry sectors.
